onChange.script:
#Move the row data to the edit data any time the row id changes
	self.custom.edit_data = self.params.row_data

config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Service Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshServicesDetail'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

### Declare parameters
	project = "RITI" 
	row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.row_id
		
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (row_id is None) or (int(row_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			#Delete the Case Note Association before deleting the service
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDeleteAssociations"
			parameters = {"service_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDelete"
			parameters = {"row_id":row_id}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			#system.perspective.print("Delete Service")
			##### Refresh the table
			#if Refresh:	
			#	system.perspective.print("Query Success")
			#else:
				#system.perspective.print("Query Fail")
				#system.perspective.print(Refresh)
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshServicesDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
			
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

self.view.params.row_data.HMIS = 0
	self.view.params.row_data.comment = ''
	self.view.params.row_data.employee_id = self.session.custom.loggedInStaffEmployeeID
	self.view.params.row_data.enrollment_id = -1
	self.view.params.row_data.quantity = 1
	self.view.params.row_data.service_id = -1
	self.view.params.row_data.service_location_id = -1
	
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.HMIS = 0
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.comment = ''
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.enrollment_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.quantity = 1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.service_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.service_location_id = -1

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		## changes as per ticket #209 - done by Yogini Marathe
		time_created = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.time_created
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
#		participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
		employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
		enrollment_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.enrollment_id
		service_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.service_id
		HMIS = self.view.custom.edit_data.HMIS
		quantity = self.view.custom.edit_data.quantity
		comment = self.view.custom.edit_data.comment
		service_location_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.service_location_id
	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		errorMessage = ""
		if (employee_id is None) or (int(employee_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			errorMessage = "Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving."
			system.perspective.print("Employee ID Error")
		elif (enrollment_id is None) or (int(enrollment_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			errorMessage = "Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving."
			system.perspective.print("Enrollment ID Error")
		elif (service_id is None) or (int(service_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			errorMessage = "Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving."
			system.perspective.print("Service ID Error")
		elif (HMIS is None) or (HMIS == "") or (int(HMIS) < 0):
			valid = False
			errorMessage = "Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving."
			system.perspective.print("HMIS Selection Error")
		elif (service_location_id is None) or (int(service_location_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("service_location_id Error")
			error_message = "Please select a Service Location"
		else:
			## check for any suspended Participants
			## check for matching enrollments
			suspendedParticipants = []
			participantsWithMissingPrograms = []
			if self.view.params.participantList is not None and len(self.view.params.participantList) > 0:
				for participant in self.view.params.participantList:
					if participant.value['suspended'] == True:
						suspendedParticipants.append(participant.value['firstName'] + " " + participant.value['lastName'])
					if str(enrollment_id) not in str(participant.value['enrollments']):
						participantsWithMissingPrograms.append(participant.value['firstName'] + " " + participant.value['lastName'])
			if len(participantsWithMissingPrograms) > 0:
				errorMessage = "Participants - " + ",".join(participantsWithMissingPrograms) + " do not have selected Program"
				valid = False
			elif len(suspendedParticipants) > 0:
				valid = False
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"allParticipantsList":self.view.params.participantList,
								"suspendedParticipantNames":suspendedParticipants,"employee_id":employee_id,"enrollment_id":enrollment_id, 
								"service_id":service_id,"user_name":user_name, "HMIS":HMIS,"quantity":quantity, "comment":comment, "service_location_id":service_location_id}
				system.perspective.openPopup("BatchSaveServiceWarning", "Participants/Services/Batch/Cards/Edit/SaveServiceWarning", params = parameters)
			else:
				valid = True
				system.perspective.print("Servcies Detail Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if self.view.params.participantList is not None and len(self.view.params.participantList) > 0:
				for participant in self.view.params.participantList:
					participant_id = participant.value['participantId']
					#system.perspective.print("Insert New Data")
					system.perspective.print(HMIS)
					path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailInsert"
					parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"participant_id":participant_id,
								"employee_id":employee_id,"enrollment_id":enrollment_id, 
								"service_id":service_id,"user_name":user_name,
								"HMIS":HMIS,"quantity":quantity,
								"comment":comment, "service_location_id":service_location_id}
					Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
					
					## also add a program if service selected is Winter Shelter Orientation
					if self.view.custom.selectedServiceName == "Winter Shelter Orientation":
						## add a program to the participant
						path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
						parameters = {"participantId": participant_id, "programId":self.view.custom.winterShelterProgramId}
						system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
				
				###################################
				# Increment Yearly Services
				total_services = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]RITI/Participants/long_TotalServices"])[0].value
				total_services += len(self.view.params.participantList)
				system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]RITI/Participants/long_TotalServices"], [total_services])
				
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Services created successfully.")
				## clear the selected participants
				system.perspective.sendMessage("clearParticipants", payload={}, scope="session")
				## clear services selection
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.HMIS = ''
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.comment = ''
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.employee_id = ''
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.enrollment_id = -1
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.quantity = ''
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.service_id = -1
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.type_id = -1
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please select at least one participant.")
				
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(errorMessage)
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Batch Services")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

#send message to batch services to execute insert loop - Participants/Services/Batch/Cards/Participant_Select>root container
	message = 'updateServices'
	payload = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params
	payload['comment'] = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.comment
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage(message, payload)
	system.util.getLogger('Batch Services').info(str(payload))

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	addSuspended = payload['allow_suspended'] 
#	time_created = system.date.now()
	time_created = self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.time_created
	user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
#		participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
	employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
	enrollment_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.enrollment_id
	service_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.service_id
	HMIS = self.view.custom.edit_data.HMIS
	quantity = self.view.custom.edit_data.quantity
	comment = self.view.custom.edit_data.comment
	service_location_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.service_location_id
	project = "RITI"
	path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailInsert"
	if self.view.params.participantList is not None and len(self.view.params.participantList) > 0:
		noOfServicesAdded = 0
		for participant in self.view.params.participantList:
			if addSuspended == False and participant.value['suspended'] == True:
				pass
			else:
				participant_id = participant.value['participantId']
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"participant_id":participant_id,
							"employee_id":employee_id,"enrollment_id":enrollment_id, 
							"service_id":service_id,"user_name":user_name,
							"HMIS":HMIS,"quantity":quantity,
							"comment":comment, "service_location_id":service_location_id}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
				noOfServicesAdded = noOfServicesAdded + 1	
				## also add a program if service selected is Winter Shelter Orientation
				if self.view.custom.selectedServiceName == "Winter Shelter Orientation":
					## add a program to the participant
					path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
					parameters = {"participantId": participant_id, "programId":self.view.custom.winterShelterProgramId}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)	
		#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
		
		###################################
		# Increment Yearly Services
		total_services = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]RITI/Participants/long_TotalServices"])[0].value
		total_services += noOfServicesAdded
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[default]RITI/Participants/long_TotalServices"], [total_services])
		
		if addSuspended == True:
			self.getChild("root Actions").getChild("Label").showMessage("Services created successfully.")
		else:
			self.getChild("root Actions").getChild("Label").showMessage("Services created for participants excluding suspended.")
		## clear the selected participants
		system.perspective.sendMessage("clearParticipants", payload={}, scope="session")
		## clear services selection
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.HMIS = ''
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.comment = ''
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.employee_id = ''
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.enrollment_id = -1
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.quantity = ''
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.service_id = -1
		self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.type_id = -1
